title: Bloomberg Markets: Plenty's High-Tech Vertical Farm

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Selina Wang\u0010Global Technology Reporter\u0010Bloomberg News \u0010Discussing startup Plenty's plan to build massive indoor farms on the outskirts of every major city on Earth.
